filmography.title: The Petty Girl
filmography.role_description: An uncredited early role as a model in this musical comedy, marking her very first appearance on screen.
filmography.plot: A pin-up artist tries to convince a strait-laced professor to let him paint her.

filmography.title: The Birds
filmography.role_description: A wealthy San Francisco socialite who pursues a potential boyfriend to a small town that suddenly comes under attack by birds.
filmography.plot: A wealthy San Francisco socialite pursues a potential boyfriend to a small Northern California town that slowly takes a turn for the bizarre when birds of all kinds suddenly begin to attack people.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Win â€“ Most Promising Newcomer

filmography.title: Marnie
filmography.role_description: A compulsive thief and liar with a deep psychological trauma who is blackmailed into marriage by a wealthy widower.
filmography.plot: Mark Rutland marries Marnie, a thief, and tries to help her confront and resolve her repressed past traumas.

filmography.title: A Countess from Hong Kong
filmography.role_description: The estranged wife of an American diplomat who becomes entangled in a shipboard farce; Charlie Chaplin's final film.
filmography.plot: A Russian countess stows away in the stateroom of a wealthy American diplomat, leading to romantic complications.

filmography.title: Tiger by the Tail
filmography.role_description: A socialite girlfriend of a war hero who helps him investigate his brother's murder.
filmography.plot: A Vietnam war hero returns home to find his brother murdered and takes matters into his own hands.

filmography.title: Satan's Harvest
filmography.role_description: An American woman who inherits an estate in South Africa and gets caught in a drug-smuggling plot.
filmography.plot: An American inherits an estate in South Africa, only to find it is being used as a front for drug smuggling.

filmography.title: Mr. Kingstreet's War
filmography.role_description: The wife of a lodge owner in Africa who tries to maintain neutrality as World War II encroaches on their sanctuary.
filmography.plot: An American couple managing a wildlife preserve in Africa try to stay out of WWII as the conflict reaches their doorstep.

filmography.title: The Harrad Experiment
filmography.role_description: The wife of a professor conducting a controversial experiment on sexual freedom at a college.
filmography.plot: A college professor and his wife conduct experiments in human sexuality and free love with their students.

filmography.title: Roar
filmography.role_description: A mother who visits her husband's African sanctuary and is terrorized by untrained big cats; famously dangerous production.
filmography.plot: A family visits their father, who lives with wild lions and tigers, leading to a terrifying struggle for survival.

filmography.title: Foxfire Light
filmography.role_description: The domineering mother of a young woman who tries to control her daughter's romantic life.
filmography.plot: A wealthy, sheltered young woman romances a cowboy in the Ozarks, clashing with her controlling mother.

filmography.title: Deadly Spygames
filmography.role_description: A supporting role in a spy thriller involving KGB agents and stolen microfilm.
filmography.plot: A spy falls in love with a woman while trying to retrieve stolen microfilm from the KGB.

filmography.title: In the Cold of the Night
filmography.role_description: The mother of a fashion photographer who is tormented by bizarre nightmares.
filmography.plot: A photographer begins to suspect that his vivid nightmares of murder are actually real events.

filmography.title: Pacific Heights
filmography.role_description: A wealthy older woman who unknowingly aids a sociopathic con artist in his scheme against landlords.
filmography.plot: A couple rents an apartment to a man who turns out to be a nightmare tenant with a dark past.

filmography.title: The Birds II: Land's End
filmography.role_description: A small supporting role in the television sequel to her most famous film, playing a different character.
filmography.plot: A biology teacher and his family move to an island summer house, only to find the local birds attacking humans.

filmography.title: Citizen Ruth
filmography.role_description: A pro-choice activist and leader of a feminist group who tries to influence a pregnant drug addict.
filmography.plot: An irresponsible, drug-addicted woman finds herself in the middle of an abortion debate when she gets pregnant.

filmography.title: Break Up
filmography.role_description: The mother of a woman in an abusive marriage, appearing in this thriller starring Bridget Fonda.
filmography.plot: A woman wakes up with amnesia and is told she is married to a man she doesn't recognize, leading to a terrifying discovery.

filmography.title: I Woke Up Early the Day I Died
filmography.role_description: A role in this silent comedy thriller based on an unproduced Ed Wood script.
filmography.plot: A cross-dressing madman escapes from an asylum and goes on a killing spree to retrieve a stolen notebook.

filmography.title: The Story of Us
filmography.role_description: The mother of Michelle Pfeiffer's character, observing her daughter's crumbling marriage.
filmography.plot: A couple tries to save their fifteen-year marriage while dealing with their children and parents.

filmography.title: The Darklings
filmography.role_description: A wealthy, bedridden woman who becomes the target of a scam by a young man who befriends her.
filmography.plot: A teen befriends a wealthy invalid, but his intentions are sinister as he plots to steal her money.

filmography.title: Mind Rage
filmography.role_description: A psychiatrist who tries to help a vengeful man deal with his traumatic past.
filmography.plot: A man seeks revenge on the people who killed his family, while a psychiatrist tries to stop him from losing his mind.

filmography.title: Dunsmore
filmography.role_description: A local judge in a small Florida town dealing with a murder investigation.
filmography.plot: A Florida investigator looks into a bizarre murder in a backwoods town, uncovering local secrets.

filmography.title: I Heart Huckabees
filmography.role_description: A corporate board member and the 'face' of the Huckabees corporation, representing the establishment.
filmography.plot: A husband-and-wife team play detective, but not in the traditional sense. Instead, the happy duo helps others solve their existential issues.

filmography.title: The Last Confederate: The Story of Robert Adams
filmography.role_description: The grandmother of the protagonist in this historical drama produced by her grandson Julian Adams.
filmography.plot: The true story of a Confederate Captain and his Northern bride who are torn apart by the Civil War.

filmography.title: Free Samples
filmography.role_description: An elderly, former movie star who shares a poignant moment with a young woman running an ice cream truck.
filmography.plot: A law-school dropout running an ice cream truck is awoken from her stupor by a meeting with an elderly stranger.

filmography.title: Return to Babylon
filmography.role_description: A role in this experimental silent film about the scandals of early Hollywood.
filmography.plot: A silent film capturing the scandals and tragedies of the stars of the 1920s in Hollywood.
